alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Dallas; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 10:57PM CDT until November 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLEVELAND...GRANT...CENTRAL DALLAS...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE...EASTERN HOT SPRING AND SOUTH CENTRAL PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1056 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Orion, or 13 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Sheridan... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Traskwood... Leola... Tull... Carthage... Prattsville... Poyen... Lamont... Cane Creek... Jenkins Ferry State Park... East End... Orion... Thiel... Mabelvale... Dogwood... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
